Package main.java.matrices.io

Interface ExportMatrix

  • public interface ExportMatrix
    Interface which is used to access static methods that control the exporting of matrices to external files.
    Author:
    Joshua McDonagh

    • Method Summary

      Static Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static <T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
      void      		 asCsv​(java.lang.String fileName, CMatrix<T> matrix)
      Exports a given comparable matrix as a CSV file.

      Exports a given double matrix as a CSV file.

      Exports a given generic matrix as a CSV file.

    • Method Detail

      • asTxt

        static <T> void asTxt​(java.lang.String fileName,
                      java.lang.String delimiter,
                      GMatrix<T> matrix)
               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Exports a given generic matrix as a text file.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The value type of which is contained by the matrix
        Parameters:
        fileName - The filename of the file to export the matrix to
        delimiter - The string which separates each row element in the exported text file
        matrix - The generic matrix to export
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Exception thrown if the file exporting the matrix to is not found
